  <h1 class="ProfileHeaderCard-name">

  <h2 class="ProfileHeaderCard-screenname u-inlineBlock u-dir" dir="ltr">
    <a class="ProfileHeaderCard-screennameLink u-linkComplex js-nav" href="/AlbertOwenMP">

    </a>
  </h2>

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="974616394984841216" id="stream-item-tweet-974616394984841216" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;974616394984841216&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">H/HeadMaritimeMuseum Retweeted Simon McClean</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Such a sad loss. The Holyhead Maritime Museum is working on a programme of events for October 2018 to commemorate the centenary of the loss of RMS Leinster, sunk en route from Kingstown (Dun Laoghaire) to Holyhead. Over 560 lives lost. More information will be posted soon.<a href="https://t.co/OtsRVgTixq" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/TallYachter/status/972604591555731456" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/TallYachter/status/972604591555731456"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/TallYachter/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/972604591555731456</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">H/HeadMaritimeMuseum added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>
          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Thinking of my Mother yesterday and how she loved to sing Ken Dodd-fond memories-<a href="https://t.co/HKx6zpy9tD" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/dailypostwales/status/973119037667454977" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/dailypostwales/status/973119037667454977"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/dailypostwales</span><span class="invisible">/status/973119037667454977</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

Had a full Constituency weekend with advice surgeries in Llangefni &amp; Holyhead and events and meetings in Beaumaris &amp; Amlwch -watch rugby &amp; got a coast walk in the spring showers</p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">45</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

          <div class="action-confirmation dismiss-module-item">Thanks. Twitter will use this info to make your timeline better.
            <span class="undo-action">Undo</span>

We need to make sure that the right price is paid for the products ending up in our supermarkets.       <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/AlbertOwenMP" data-user-id="1354610803">

    <div class="dropdown">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Pleased to promote the Island and Wales as part of <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="138388299"><s>@</s><b>VisitBritainBiz</b></span> <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ExploreGB2018</b></span>, with lovely people from Italy and Spain. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Anglesey</b></span> <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>YnysMon</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/wkgwo2D9MQ</span></div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Met Geoff, Ed &amp; Marina team again today and they are working flat out &amp; with the appropriate authorities to consider all necessary next steps. They are devastated but resilient &amp; grateful to the support shown by the local community.<a href="https://t.co/b2zNDvJlTc" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/dailypostwales/status/969969957764321280" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/dailypostwales/status/969969957764321280"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/dailypostwales</span><span class="invisible">/status/969969957764321280</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Since the <a href="/hashtag/BeastFromTheEast?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BeastFromTheEast</b></a> arrived our volunteers have shown that they'll help those on land as well at sea! Volunteer Flood Rescue team members from <a href="/rhyllifeboat" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="577012061"><s>@</s><b>rhyllifeboat</b></a> <a href="/ConwyLifeboat" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="551293476"><s>@</s><b>ConwyLifeboat</b></a> &amp; <a href="/BeaumarisRNLI" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="719652331"><s>@</s><b>BeaumarisRNLI</b></a> assisted <a href="/hashtag/NHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>NHS</b></a> medical staff to hospital this morning <a href="/hashtag/ProudOfOurCrowd?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ProudOfOurCrowd</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/StormEmma?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StormEmma</b></a><a href="https://t.co/lwSX31Ktpi" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/lwSX31Ktpi</a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Just back from <a href="/hashtag/Holyhead?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Holyhead</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/Marina?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Marina</b></a> which has been hit very hard by last nights storms. Several vessels grounded and stranded and extensive damage to both Commercial and Pleasure vessels. I truly hope that this does not impact upon the livelihoods of residents of the town.<a href="https://t.co/eYQsd20azB" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/eYQsd20azB</a></p>

<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Albert Owen MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/AlbertOwenMP/status/969591403805323264" data-conversation-id="969591403805323264" aria-hidden="true">

    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="969591403805323264" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="AlbertOwenMP" data-user-id="1354610803" href="/AlbertOwenMP/status/969591403805323264" data-conversation-id="969591403805323264" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Albert Owen MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>AlbertOwenMP</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">HM Coastguard is advising people to avoid <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>HolyheadMarina</b></span> as they continue to deal with adverse weather conditions and <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StormEmma</b></span>.  So far, 80 vessels are at risk of damage in the harbour and the public are being reminded to stay at a safe distance. <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>999Coastguard</b></span> <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Holyhead</b></span></div>
        </div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="969590585077182464" data-item-id="969590585077182464" data-permalink-path="/AlbertOwenMP/status/969590585077182464" data-conversation-id="969590585077182464" data-tweet-nonce="969590585077182464-fb944f37-be13-4178-88f6-20b171cf305d" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="AlbertOwenMP" data-name="Albert Owen MP" data-user-id="1354610803" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1354610803&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AlbertOwenMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Albert Owen MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Albert Owen MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Albert Owen MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/AlbertOwenMP" data-user-id="1354610803">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Extreme weather has caused damage at Holyhead Marina. <a href="/HheadLifeboat" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="803646236112797696"><s>@</s><b>HheadLifeboat</b></a> has been moved to a safer location and remains on service. Conditions remain dangerous. Please do not put yourself at risk - no photo is worth a life. Keep a safe distance and <a href="/hashtag/RespecttheWater?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>RespecttheWater</b></a> <a href="/RNLI" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="24916036"><s>@</s><b>RNLI</b></a> <a href="/MCA_media" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="41165310"><s>@</s><b>MCA_media</b></a><a href="https://t.co/c9qzqSSbgA" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/c9qzqSSbgA</a></p>
</div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Albert Owen MP Retweeted Roger Awan-Scully</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">'The bigger picture....a clear majority support for devolution in Wales. Public appetite either for independence or for the abolition of devolution continues to be very limited. Most people in Wales seem to want some self-government but to remain within the UK' Spot on Roger!<a href="https://t.co/kyHEx8p8IA" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/roger_scully/status/969243343803834368" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/roger_scully/status/969243343803834368"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/roger_scully/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/969243343803834368</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Albert Owen MP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/roger_scully/status/969243343803834368" data-conversation-id="969243343803834368" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="969243343803834368" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="roger_scully" data-user-id="391296257" href="/roger_scully/status/969243343803834368" data-conversation-id="969243343803834368" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Roger Awan-Scully</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>roger_scully</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Something to read over your afternoon tea (or coffee, for the more uncivilised amongst you): the latest evidence on public attitudes to devolution in Wales, from <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="130827937"><s>@</s><b>ICMResearch</b></span> and <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="104811393"><s>@</s><b>WalesPolitics</b></span> 

</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The BBC/ICM Poll: Voting Intentions  Elections in Wales  Etholiadau yng Nghymru - Cardiff University-Continued strong polling by Labour for both Westminster &amp; the Assembly<a href="https://t.co/6pzlJ8NUgU" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://blogs.cardiff.ac.uk/electionsinwales/2018/03/01/the-bbc-icm-poll-voting-intentions/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://blogs.cardiff.ac.uk/electionsinwales/2018/03/01/the-bbc-icm-poll-voting-intentions/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">blogs.cardiff.ac.uk/electionsinwal</span><span class="invisible">es/2018/03/01/the-bbc-icm-poll-voting-intentions/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

  </div>

    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The event has been postponed until Saturday 10th March. I have just found out, about half an hour ago, that the school is not compatible to withstand 2000+ people inside. This is solely down to health and safety! 

Sorry, but please come along next Saturday
 <a href="/AlbertOwenMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1354610803"><s>@</s><b>AlbertOwenMP</b></a></p>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Wales poll from BBC/ICM:
(Westminster voting intention)
Labour: 49% (+0.1)
Conservatives: 32% (-1.6)
Plaid Cymru: 11% (+0.6)
Liberal Democrats: 5% (+0.5)
UKIP: 2% (no change)
Others: 3% (+2.5)
See <a href="/roger_scully" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="391296257"><s>@</s><b>roger_scully</b></a> for more....</p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The school is CLOSED today 01/03/18 for pupils.
A site inspection was carried out this morning and the yard remains frozen and hazardous.  The low temperature and forecast indicate that conditions will not improve during the day.  The school will OPEN to staff until 1pm.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="0">01/03/18 - Dydd Iau
Yn dilyn archwiliad diogelwch safle y bore ma gwnaed y penderfyniad i GAU yn ysgol eto heddiw. Rhannwch y neges os gwelwch yn dda! 

Dydd Gyl Dewi Hapus i chi gyd! <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f3f4-e0067-e0062-e0077-e006c-e0073-e007f.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Flag of Wales" aria-label="Emoji: Flag of Wales" />

          </div>
        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>

It's also the start of meteorological Spring... although that feels more like April Fool's Day!

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">13</span>

  </button>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">13</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-968923433064194053">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">My children just texted what I should have responded to <a href="/afneil" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="136004952"><s>@</s><b>afneil</b></a>  invitation to whistle:
Im sorry Andrew Neil youre clearly not a parent or you would know my children would never forgive me for such an act of social embarrassment
Ah...hindsight!<a href="https://t.co/i06YX1UDDG" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/daily_politics/status/968834236907102208" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/daily_politics/status/968834236907102208"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/daily_politics</span><span class="invisible">/status/968834236907102208</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Could we have something live? <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="136004952"><s>@</s><b>afneil</b></span> asks <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="107722321"><s>@</s><b>barrygardiner</b></span> and <span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>bbcdp</b></span> viewers then (possibly) enjoy whistled versions of The Red Flag and Ode to Joy <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/G5gIwfDBxj</span></div>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/DavidHughesYDH/status/968861774190727168" data-conversation-id="968861774190727168" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="968861774190727168" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="DavidHughesYDH" data-user-id="2775684497" href="/DavidHughesYDH/status/968861774190727168" data-conversation-id="968861774190727168" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">
      <div class="QuoteMedia-container js-quote-media-container">
          <div class="QuoteMedia-singlePhoto">
    <div class="QuoteMedia-photoContainer js-quote-photo" data-image-url="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DXIWoYHW4AAYy5n.jpg" data-element-context="platform_photo_card" style="background-color:rgba(57,39,64,1.0);" data-dominant-color="[57,39,64]">

      </div>
  </div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Ysgol David Hughes</b><span class="UserBadges"></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>DavidHughesYDH</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Dyma Ioan a Gruff wnaeth greu y dyn eira Everton ddoe a Deio a Cai ddaeth yn ail agos hefo'r golgeidwad. Ioan and Gruff who created the Everton snowman and Deio and Cai who were a close second with the goalie. </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The <a href="/hashtag/Civil?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Civil</b></a> Servant who was actually head of this <a href="/hashtag/Brexit?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Brexit</b></a> governments newly created Dept for International Trade, reveals that there is, in fact, no prospect of fulfilling the <a href="/hashtag/brexiter?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>brexiter</b></a> promises of getting better <a href="/hashtag/TradeDeals?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TradeDeals</b></a> than we have now via EU<a href="https://t.co/8KtDusp17d" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/bbcr4today/status/968503763236515841" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/bbcr4today/status/968503763236515841"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/bbcr4today/sta</span><span class="invisible">tus/968503763236515841</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Carolyn 4 Deputy Retweeted Labour Senedd</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Great to see campaigns such as <a href="/RhonddaBryant" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="20995648"><s>@</s><b>RhonddaBryant</b></a>'s <a href="/hashtag/ProtectTheProtectors?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ProtectTheProtectors</b></a> Bill receiving a strong Welsh Labour voice in the Senedd as well as in Parliament. 

It's this close working between Cardiff Bay and Westminster which shows our party at it's best. 
<a href="/hashtag/Carolyn4Deputy?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Carolyn4Deputy</b></a><a href="https://t.co/nEWUqGFQfV" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/LabourSenedd/status/968488140234215426" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/LabourSenedd/status/968488140234215426"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/LabourSenedd/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/968488140234215426</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Carolyn 4 Deputy added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

</small>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">
    <div class="dropdown">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton u-textUserColorHover dropdown-toggle js-dropdown-toggle" type="button" aria-haspopup="true">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="cy" data-aria-label-part="0">34 schools on Anglesey closed due to snow.

The schools that have remained OPEN are: Caergeiliog, Kingsland, Santes Fair, Tywyn, Cybi, Llannerchymedd, Rhyd y Llan, Bodffordd, Llanbedrgoch, Cemaes, Carreglefn, Moelfre, Penysarn, Rhosybol ac Uwchradd Bodedern.

<a href="/MonFMRadio" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="482963313"><s>@</s><b>MonFMRadio</b></a></p>
</div>

      <span class="Icon Icon--small Icon--retweeted"></span>



            <span class="js-retweet-text">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0"><a href="/hashtag/OTD?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>OTD</b></a> 1900. The Labour Representation Committee (LRC) is formed in London. At a socialist conference, the 129 delegates pass Keir Hardie's motion to create a distinct group to represent working class people in Parliament. It would go on to become the Labour Party.<a href="https://t.co/PEKtMTZBUJ" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/PEKtMTZBUJ</a></p>
</div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">One of the many jewels in the <a href="/hashtag/Anglesey?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Anglesey</b></a> beach &amp; bays crown.<a href="https://t.co/wAe02FJdmB" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/stefrobinson/status/968383359201267712" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/stefrobinson/status/968383359201267712"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/stefrobinson/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/968383359201267712</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-968238693885526016">

Please take care on the roads. <a href="/hashtag/StaySafe?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>StaySafe</b></a>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Fourth Industrial Revolution (<a href="/hashtag/4IR?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>4IR</b></a>) is reshaping industries, blurring geographical boundaries and challenging existing regulatory frameworks.       <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">9</span>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;       tweet-has-context&#10;       has-cards cards-forward&#10;" data-tweet-id="967838104747786240" data-item-id="967838104747786240" data-permalink-path="/ProspectUnion/status/967838104747786240" data-conversation-id="967838104747786240" data-tweet-nonce="967838104747786240-0973ce7d-b1eb-43b9-9393-7f1563cbcba1" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-retweet-id="967851023128817666" data-retweeter="AlbertOwenMP" data-screen-name="ProspectUnion" data-name="Prospect Union" data-user-id="26781810" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-mentions="frankfieldteam" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;26781810&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;ProspectUnion&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Prospect Union&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Prospect Union&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Prospect Union&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;1354610803&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;AlbertOwenMP&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Albert Owen MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Albert Owen MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Albert Owen MP&quot;}},{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;20688804&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;frankfieldteam&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Frank Field MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Frank Field MP&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Frank Field MP&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="" data-card2-type="summary_large_image" data-has-cards="true">

      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="967472921097711618" id="stream-item-tweet-967472921097711618" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;967472921097711618&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">An entertaining game and the better team won-well done Ireland <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/1f3c9.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Rugby football" aria-label="Emoji: Rugby football" /><a href="https://t.co/bUneyZHrtM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/sixnationsrugby/status/967429968958509058" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/sixnationsrugby/status/967429968958509058"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/sixnationsrugb</span><span class="invisible">y/status/967429968958509058</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

What an ending in Dublin! Wales give it everything as they look for a match-winning score but an ambitious long pass is plucked out of the air by @JacobStockdalefor the interception!

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">A full constituency Friday includes meetings in Llangefni, Rhosneigr and out and about and advice surgeries in Beaumaris.</p>
</div>

    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
